posts.post_content:
Posted By: Andy Cook
I have over 50 tobacco and other prewar cards available to trade posted at [url]http://pclcards.com/trade.html[/url] most have scans posted, any that don't I can send scans.

I'm interested in trading for T207, T212-3, T213 (all types), T217 Mono (highest priority-would trade aggressively for a PSA-1 or SGC-10).

Thanks,
Andy

typecard@aol.com

Posted By: Richie
Email sent. I need paypal address. Thanks Richie

Posted By: Andy Cook
The T209 B&W Dobson is available for $100 delivered. A number of other cards are gone, I will post an updated page tonight. You can see scans of Dobson at [url]http://pclcards.com/trade.html[/url]
